name: Anita Mahfood
description: '''Anita "Margarita" Mahfood''' (died 2 January 1965) was a dancer, actress, and singer in [[Jamaica]]. She was called "the famous Rhumba queen" and headlined performances. Her career developed during the ska era, prior to the emergence of [[reggae]], performing and composing Jamaican popular music of that period, which made her one of the early women in Jamaica to write and sing her own material. Mahfood was murdered in 1965, by her boyfriend [[Don Drummond]] of the [[Skatalites]] band.
